sub_title: Lecturer at Academy for Integrative Medicine and Maastricht University
summary:
Resie Moonen is a Homeopathic Medical Doctor and General Practitionar with more then 35 years of experience. 
She is a respected teacher in Homeopathy and Integrative Medicine and gives seminars allover the world. Her seminars are in Dutch, English, German or French language. The topics are: Complementary medicine (Maastricht University), Homeopathy during all stages of life: pregnancy, birth, childhood, respiratory problems, female problems, auto-immune diseases, older people, and palliative care. Also she gives seminars about different Plant Families and the Periodic Table, especially about the use of Lanthanides, and the Stages in the Periodic Table and in Plant Families. 
 

Specialities: Teacher in Homeopathy and Integrative Medicine.
INVITED SPEAKER (from 2011):
LIGA Congresses in Berlin, Oostende (B) and Paris 
2011, 2014 and 2016: Seminars in New York School of Homeopathy, Manhattan         
2013: Seminars in Gent (B), Fiesa (Slovenia), Amersfoort, Dortmund, Budapest and Zurich
2014: Seminars in Munchen, Berlin, Hamburg, Paris, Amersfoort, Groningen, Tubingen, New York
          and speaker at the Narayana Congress Freiburg /Bad Krozingen
2015 Seminars in Germany, Strasbourg and Toulouse (in French), Slovenia, Zurich and Budapest
2016: Seminars in Germany (including Narayana Congress and München), France and in New York
2017: Keynote speaker at 2017 JAHC in Atlanta, USA
2017: Speaker at the WISH Conference München,  and seminars in Erfurt, Tübingen and Zürich
2018 and 2019: Speaker at the Narayana Conference, and seminars in München, Berlin, Toulouse, Budapest, Meissen, Mainz and Erfurt
2020: Seminars in Berlin, Paris, Toulouse, Meissen and München. Speaker at the Synergy of Approaches Conference, and at the unitedtoheal online Conference
2021: Webinars in Berlin, Tübingen, München, Utrecht. Speaker at ICE Wiss Hom Conference and Pediatrics Conference of the HOPE-TOS Academy Mumbai
2022: Speaker München Homeop Tage, Keynote Speaker at JAHC 2022 Reston (USA), Berlin Conference, Mainz und Meissen, and DHÄ Congress in Münster, Germany

profile_positions.description: Resie is working as a volunteer in the international medical project in Bhaktapur (Nepal), together with medical doctors from Germany, Spain, Chech Republic, Hungary and Italy. More information to be found on the website.
profile_positions.title: Medical Doctor and Teacher in the Bhaktapur Homeopathic Clinic and College Nepal

company.name: Schools for Homeopathy and international seminars

profile_positions.company: Schools for Homeopathy and international seminars
profile_positions.description:
One reaction on the seminar she gave in New York: Resie’s class was really wonderful and the style of teaching was very helpful (and enjoyable) in understanding remedies and remedy pictures. I was grateful that she showed the main part of the interviews and not the whole intake. I loved her enthusiasm when the client totally embodied the motions of the remedy. Her energy is so Light and quite infectious. I don’t know how anyone could not want to learn more about homeopathy after being in her class and in her presence. And something really important that I got out of the weekend from her passion for her work was that what we choose to do in life is work if we don’t like it and it is our joy if it is our calling. Resie Moonen is clearly living her calling.
After the NY seminar on Lanthanides: Thank you for such an illuminating and inspiring seminar. Not only did I learn a lot about the nature of the Lanthanides, but I also feel much more confident about how to approach the mineral kingdom in general.
In German, after a seminar in Zurich:
Ich möchte mich nochmals ganz herzlich für das Seminar vom vergangenen Wochenende bedanken. Es war so inspirierend und lebendig! Mir hat gut gefallen, dein Feuer und deine Begeisterung so deutlich zu spüren! Die Fälle waren alle gut nachvollziehbar, die gewählten Arzneimittel nicht 'exotisch'.  Dass du verschiedene Richtungen in deine Arbeit einfliessen lässt, dich dabei aber doch fest auf die Repertorisation verlässt, hat mir sehr gut gefallen. Dein Umgang mit dem kranken und sterbenden Menschen (soweit ich das 'aus der Ferne' beurteilen kann) empfinde ich als sehr achtsam und respektvoll!
Reaction on the LIGA conference speech in PARIS: By the way, you got so many gratulations and compliments for your speech in Liga-Paris Congress, and indeed you have been really great! Short, precise, analytical clear, charming, warm, empathic. What a wonderful combination!
